Catalyst uses a **colored rarity system** to help you discover what items are common and which are exotic, and everything in between.
- Item boxes are usually **color coordinated** to show what rarity the items are, it is also displayed in the **item description.**
- The top rarities are **sought after items.**
- There are **7 tiers** to the rarity scale.
Higher tier items are `usually associated with selling price`, the armour system also shows rarity and is `usually associated with the amount of protection` it will give you.

Rarer items are found doing `Server Events`, `Heists` and finding `Stashes`, you can sell them for extra money or `Catalyst Coins` *__(Catalyst Coins are only gained if the items sell at the Exchange trader)__*.
